name: Seerath

specials.name: Deny Advantage
specials.description: Seerath isn't flat-footed to creatures of 10th level or lower that are hidden, undetected, flanking, or using surprise attack.

specials.name: Nanite Surge
specials.description: Trigger Seerath attempts a skill check but hasn't rolled yet; Effect Seerath stimulates her nanites, forcing her body to temporarily increase its efficiency. She gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check. In addition, her circuitry glows, creating a 10-foot emanation with dim light for 1 round.

specials.name: One Shot, One Kill
specials.description: as the gunslinger sniper initial deed, 2d6

specials.name: Vital Shot
specials.description: as the gunslinger sniper advanced deed, 2d6

specials.name: Covet Charge
specials.description: Frequency once a day; Effect Seerath makes a Strike with her timeworn zero pistol. This Strike does not use any charges.

specials.name: Snare Crafting
specials.description: Seerath can Craft snares and has the supplies to make up to two raining knives snares and up to two binding snares.

specials.name: Nimble Dodge
specials.description: Trigger Seerath is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker she can see; Effect Seerath gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

items: scatterlight suit^, timeworn zero pistol^, concussion grenade^ (5), battery^ (2)
savenote: +1 circumstance to all saves vs. disease, poison, and radiation

strikes.name: timeworn zero pistol
strikes.damage: 1d6+11 cold plus slowed 1 for 1 round on a critical hit
